Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: "Early Years" and "Last Chapter". While giving the necessary background information about the complicated, poignant life of the author, it also portrays the harsh reality of Japanese life in the 20th century, with themes revolving around business capitalism, racism, and war.
